wikipedia_page.main:
Ross Millen (born 28 September 1994) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Scunthorpe United. Millen has previously played for Dunfermline Athletic, Livingston, Clyde, Queen's Park and Kilmarnock.
He is the son of former Ayr United, Kilmarnock, Alloa, Hamilton and St Mirren defender Andy Millen.

response: *14 May 2015: The club announced that eighteen of the clubs squad were to be released after The Pars' failure to achieve promotion to the Scottish Championship. Among those released were vice-captain Gregor Buchanan, long-serving midfielder Ryan Thomson and full back Ross Millen. Manager Allan Johnston stated that he felt it was important to "freshen up the squad" after the disappointing campaign of the previous season.
